definition: structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished

sentences.english: The student was saved but Roberts leg fractured in two places.
sentences.chinese: 那名學生得救了，但因此羅伯特的腿兩處骨折。

sentences.english: When his disciples heard it, they were exceedingly amazed, saying, Who then can be saved?
sentences.chinese: 門徒聽見這話，就希奇得很，說，這樣誰能得救呢。

sentences.english: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
sentences.chinese: 到那時候，凡求告主名的，就必得救。

sentences.english: O Jerusalem, wash thine heart from wickedness, that thou mayest be saved.
sentences.chinese: 耶路撒冷阿，你當洗去心中的惡，使你可以得救。

sentences.english: Conclusion The comprehensive treatment most patients with acute chlorphenamidine poisoning can be cured.
sentences.chinese: 結論經綜合救治，多能使急性殺蟲脒中毒患者得救。

sentences.english: And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.
sentences.chinese: 他們說，當信主耶穌，你和你一家都必得救。

sentences.english: Eg :1. He might have been rescued.
So Mrs. Hou put down her knife, and the hen was spared.
sentences.chinese: 於是侯夫人放下了她的刀，那隻母雞得救了。

sentences.english: 36Those who had seen it told the people how the demon-possessed man had been cured.
sentences.chinese: 看見這事的便將被鬼附着的人怎麼得救告訴他們。

sentences.english: There are no second chances once God summons a soul from a body at death.
sentences.chinese: 肉體死亡後被上帝喚出的靈魂不再有得救的機會。

sentences.english: If you go overboard, the probabilities are not in your favor.
sentences.chinese: 如果你落水了，你可不會喜歡你得救的概率。

sentences.english: You always fill my heart with songs of deliverance. WheneverI am afraid.
sentences.chinese: 你必以得救的樂歌四面環繞我，每當我心懼怕時。

sentences.english: You were saved to serve God.
You surround me with songs of deliverance. Selah.
sentences.chinese: 以得救的樂歌四面環繞我。

sentences.english: For he views the Corinthiansas already saved.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在他看來哥林多的聖徒已經得救了。

sentences.english: True story. And then they were rescued.
sentences.chinese: 真實的故事，最後他們得救了。
